response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value and significance, I propose a special introductory offer of $14,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects my commitment to making high-quality products accessible while ensuring a fair return on investment for myself. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 14500}
